ProjectTitle: Exploring the occurrence of foetal DNA damage after in utero exposure to chemotherapy - CURIOUS
InitialFeedbackHistory:
27/06/2022
Please note that the recommendations for storing clinical research data are now extended to 25 years. 
Please take a look at if KU Leuven RDR is suitable for sharing of your data, this makes it easier for others to find your data and you can restrict access so that a data access committee can evaluate requests via the repository. (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
label: good with suggestions
